name: Qzeq: The Story of Itch.io Games
name_original: Qzeq: The Story of Itch.io Games
description:
QZEQ: THE STORY OF ITCH.IO GAMES

Explore the Story of Qzeq playing Itch.io Games, with multiple Endings, beautiful art, and lovely Music.

WARNING

This game contains Curse Words, Major Spoilers for Breaking Bad, and Copyrighted Music. Most of the Assets are from Qzeqs Video, and Breaking Bad. Some other images such as Backgrounds have been found from the Web, but they're credited in the 'CREDITS.txt' File. Audio Files have been taken from the Web, or Generated by SFXR. All the Fonts are NOT owned by me, but again they're credited in the 'CREDITS.txt' File.

SPECIAL THANKS TO...

I want to say thank you, for Booz participating in the Game and being a W friend. And Dood for helping me make other Shitty games, such as John-Pork: Story Mode. And all my other Friends, especially my old Server for supporting me. 

Lastly, Thank you Qzeq.
